member.name: P:Logstream.BrowserConsoleTarget.Active
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is active.

member.name: P:Logstream.BrowserConsoleTarget.ReplayBufferSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the replay buffer.
member.value: The size of the replay buffer.

member.name: M:Logstream.BrowserConsoleTarget.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: The default value of the layout is: ${longdate}|${level:uppercase=true}|${logger}|${message}

member.name: M:Logstream.BrowserConsoleTarget.#ctor(Logstream.ChannelFactory)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Logstream.BrowserConsoleTarget.InitializeTarget
member.summary: Initializes the target. Can be used by inheriting classes to initialize logging.

member.name: M:Logstream.BrowserConsoleTarget.Write(NLog.LogEventInfo)
member.summary: Writes logging event to the log target. Must be overridden in inheriting classes.
member.param: Logging event to be written out.

member.name: M:Logstream.BrowserConsoleTarget.CloseTarget
member.summary: Closes the target and releases any unmanaged resources.
